snippet.title: Burden of Command Release Trailer!
snippet.description:
Release trailer! Find our release date in the video ;-)

 "Three Reasons NOT to Burden of Command: The Leadership RPG"
Maybe some truth in advertising for once?  Burden's not for everyone...  but it might be for you!

More on Burden:
- Discord: https://discord.gg/2dhGYtkmFB
- Wishlist | Steam : https://bit.ly/BoCSteam
- Newsletter: https://bit.ly/BoC_newsletter_signup
- Playtester Application: https://bit.ly/3R1jfd6
- Twitter (Luke runs): https://twitter.com/BurdenOfCommand?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Eauthor
